729098f-a.text:
Main Street, east side, between Amboy Road and Pittsville Avenue, showing the Beauvais Post, American Legion, No. 126.
June 4, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
729098f-a.folder: Main Street & Amboy Road, Staten Island, NY

729099f-a.text:
Main Street, north from Amboy Road.
December 26, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
729099f-a.folder: Main Street & Amboy Road, Staten Island, NY

729095f-b.text:
(1)
179, 175, and 173 Main Street, at, adjoining and north of the N.E. corner of Amboy Road. The corner building, number 179, is the
Tottenville National Bank.
September 11, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
November 26, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
